author: jacopoc
msg: Use the default value of the Tomcat connectors for the enableLookups parameter: this is false by default.

Set to true if you want calls to request.getRemoteHost() to perform DNS lookups in order to return the actual host name of the remote client. Set to false to skip the DNS lookup and return the IP address in String form instead (thereby improving performance). By default, DNS lookups are disabled.

author: jacopoc
msg: Based on review and comments from Adrian Crum, re-added the max-worker-pool-size element (that was removed as part of the changes in commit 1627092) but with a new implementation that preserves all the cleanups done in rev. 1627092.
This new implementation should be slightly more flexible but with default setup will end up with the same behavior as before 1627092.
